languages.text: Передача губернатора прерывается официальным запросом с планеты. Власти Идекса утверждают, что с вами на контакт пытался выйти член секты аристократов-еретиков, сбежавший из-под надзора стражи. Во имя Империума правительство планеты просит немедленно уничтожить предателя.

The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.
languages.original_text: Передача губернатора прерывается официальным запросом с планеты. Власти Идекса утверждают, что с вами на контакт пытался выйти член секты аристократов-еретиков, сбежавший из-под надзора стражи. Во имя Империума правительство планеты просит немедленно уничтожить предателя.

traits.locale_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who has attempted contact with you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who have escaped from their wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who has attempted contact with you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who have escaped from their wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

languages.text: Die Übertragung des Gouverneurs wird durch eine offizielle Bitte des Planeten unterbrochen. Die Behörden von Idex sagen, die Person, die dich kontaktiert hat, sei Mitglied einer ketzerischen Sekte von Adeligen, die aus der Gefangenschaft entkommen sei. Die planetare Regierung bittet dich im Namen des Imperiums, den Verräter augenblicklich hinzurichten.
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: Die Übertragung des Gouverneurs wird durch eine offizielle Bitte des Planeten unterbrochen. Die Behörden von Idex sagen, die Person, die dich kontaktiert hat, sei Mitglied einer ketzerischen Sekte von Adeligen, die aus der Gefangenschaft entkommen sei. Die planetare Regierung bittet dich im Namen des Imperiums, den Verräter augenblicklich hinzurichten.

languages.text: La transmission du gouverneur est interrompue par un appel officiel en provenance de la planète. Les autorités d'Idex prétendent que la personne qui vient de vous contacter est un membre d'une secte hérétique de nobles qui a échappé aux gardiens après sa capture. Le gouvernement planétaire demande à ce que le traître soit éliminé sur-le-champ au nom de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: La transmission du gouverneur est interrompue par un appel officiel en provenance de la planète. Les autorités d'Idex prétendent que la personne qui vient de vous contacter est un membre d'une secte hérétique de nobles qui a échappé aux gardiens après sa capture. Le gouvernement planétaire demande à ce que le traître soit éliminé sur-le-champ au nom de l'Imperium.

languages.text: 総督の通信は、惑星からの正式な要請によって中断された。イデックスの当局は、先ほどあなたに連絡してきた人物が異端の貴族派閥の一員であり、監視者の拘束から逃れた者だと主張している。惑星政府は帝国の名の下に、その反逆者を即座に排除するよう要請している。
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: 総督の通信は、惑星からの正式な要請によって中断された。イデックスの当局は、先ほどあなたに連絡してきた人物が異端の貴族派閥の一員であり、監視者の拘束から逃れた者だと主張している。惑星政府は帝国の名の下に、その反逆者を即座に排除するよう要請している。

languages.text: Una solicitud oficial del planeta interrumpe la transmisión del gobernador. Las autoridades de Idex afirman que la persona que acaba de contactar contigo es miembro de una secta hereje de nobles que ha escapado de prisión. El gobierno planetario solicita en nombre del Imperium que el traidor sea eliminado de inmediato.
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: Una solicitud oficial del planeta interrumpe la transmisión del gobernador. Las autoridades de Idex afirman que la persona que acaba de contactar contigo es miembro de una secta hereje de nobles que ha escapado de prisión. El gobierno planetario solicita en nombre del Imperium que el traidor sea eliminado de inmediato.

languages.text: 总督的消息被来自行星的官方请求打断了。艾德克斯当局声称，刚刚联系你的人是某支贵族异端教派的成员，这个人从典狱长的监管下逃了出来。行星政府希望你能以帝国的名义，立刻消灭这个叛徒。
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: 总督的消息被来自行星的官方请求打断了。艾德克斯当局声称，刚刚联系你的人是某支贵族异端教派的成员，这个人从典狱长的监管下逃了出来。行星政府希望你能以帝国的名义，立刻消灭这个叛徒。

languages.text: Valinin mesajı, gezegenden gelen resmî bir taleple kesiliyor. İdex hükûmeti yetkilileri, sana ulaşan kişinin soylulardan oluşan kâfir tarikatının dizdar gözetiminden kaçmayı başarmış mensuplarından biri olduğunu iddia ediyor. Gezegen yönetimi, haini İmparatorluk namına derhâl etkisiz hâle getirmeni talep ediyor.
languages.original_text: The governor's transmission is interrupted by an official request from the planet. Idex's authorities are claiming that the person who just contacted you is a member of a heretical sect of nobles who has escaped from the wardens' custody. The planetary government is asking, in the name of the Imperium, that the traitor be eliminated at once.

traits.locale_text: Valinin mesajı, gezegenden gelen resmî bir taleple kesiliyor. İdex hükûmeti yetkilileri, sana ulaşan kişinin soylulardan oluşan kâfir tarikatının dizdar gözetiminden kaçmayı başarmış üyelerinden biri olduğunu iddia ediyor. Gezegen yönetimi, haini İmparatorluk namına derhâl etkisiz hâle getirmeni talep ediyor.
